author: Alex Hernandez
title: 10 Ways to Keep Your Kids Entertained While Self-Isolating
description: Right now, if you have kids, you're probably wondering how you can keep your brood entertained while we stay home and follow social distancing. It may seem a daunting task to try and keep your children occupied, but these ten ways will help keep your kids ent…
content: Right now, if you have kids, you're probably wondering how you can keep your brood entertained while we are called to stay home and social distance ourselves. Life has pretty much been turned upside down for many of us, and things like going to the playground… [+10024 chars]
